resources.string:
Welcome to the pre version of Activity monitoring app!

 The application is aimed at the inefficiency of daily work and helps to plan, track and analyze working hours.
 Therefore, there are 3 main screens:

You can create plans with percentage/time you expect to spend on tasks at the plan screen.

 Then you can measure how much time you actually spend on tasks at the track screen. Tracks are updated in runtime, so you can see how remaining time changes.

 At the end of the working day, you finish your work by clicking “Finish” button and see an encouraging success message or advice to be more effective in some types of tasks.

 If you want to see trends or difference between plans and reality, then the dashboard screen can be useful for you.
